62 Linear Algebra
Two-dimensional afﬁne subspaces of Rn are called planes. The para-plane
metric equation for planes is y= x0 + λ1x1 + λ2x2, where λ1,λ2 ∈R
and U = span[x1,x2] ⊆Rn. This means that a plane is deﬁned by a
support point x0 and two linearly independent vectors x1,x2 that span
the direction space.
In Rn, the (n−1)-dimensional afﬁne subspaces are called hyperplanes,hyperplane
and the corresponding parametric equation is y = x0 + ∑n−1
i=1 λixi,
